sentences.en: A fiery steed is not trained in a courtyard, nor does a pine grow sturdy in a greenhouse.
sentences.cn: 院子里练不出千里马, 温室里长不出万年松.

sentences.en: Fiery, bitter newspaper articles awakened in Chueh - hsin memories of his youth.
sentences.cn: 报纸上的如火如荼的记载唤醒了他的被忘却了的青春.

sentences.en: He got up in front of the huge crowd and made a moving and fiery speech.
sentences.cn: 他挺身而出,在大庭广众面前,慷慨激昂地讲了一通.

sentences.en: He's got a fiery temper and flares up at the slightest provocation.
sentences.cn: 他是火爆性子,一点就着.

sentences.en: He's got that fiery temper which scares the whatsit out of everybody.
sentences.cn: 他有一副能把所有人都吓得那个什么滚什么流的火爆脾气。

sentences.en: His fiery speech agitated the crowd.
sentences.cn: 他热情洋溢的讲话激动了群众.

sentences.en: She had a fiery temper and liked to get her own way.
sentences.cn: 她脾气火爆，喜欢我行我素。

sentences.en: The camellia blossoms are a more fiery scarlet.
The fiery actress kicked him in the shins.
sentences.cn: 那位脾气暴躁的女演员踢了他的小腿。

sentences.en: The fiery player has had numerous run-ins with referees.
sentences.cn: 这位脾气暴躁的队员曾和裁判员发生过无数次争吵。

sentences.en: The fiery right-wing leader toned down his militant statements after the meeting.
sentences.cn: 言辞激烈的右翼领袖在会后收敛了他的好战言论。

sentences.en: The tonsils become fiery red and swollen.
There, above, lies the fiery half circle of the setting sun!
sentences.cn: 这上头, 半轮火红的夕阳!

trans.tran_cn: 激烈的，火似的，火热的，易燃烧的
trans.tran_en: becoming angry or excited very quickly
